attributes.action: parliament should LISTEN more and NOT dictate to us as much as they do
attributes.additional_details:
Anything which changes the direction of the country should be put to the country like a local election scheme with the options.
Just because your elected you should not have the go ahead to do what you like if new options come up after you are elected because you was not elected for that reason.
The whole parliament way needs changing as the options are so limited.
attributes.background:
I feel the country is just told what to do by 650 people and I believe it should not happen this way.
We have 66 million people and they should have a bigger say.
We have smarter people in this country then the ones running it.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
